Converting Other Repositories to Version Manager

Microsoft Visual SourceSafe

Version Manager includes a utility for converting Visual SourceSafe repositories into Version Manager archives. This utility is documented in an appendix to the Serena ChangeMan Version Manager Administrator's Guide.

Revision Control System (RCS)

Version Manager includes a script for converting RCS repositories into Version Manager archives. To obtain the latest version of this script, see KnowledgeBase document #15655 (for Windows) or #15578 (for UNIX). The script download includes a readme file with current usage information.

UNIX Source Code Control System (SCCS)

Version Manager includes a script for converting SCCS repositories into Version Manager archives. To obtain the latest version of this script, see KnowledgeBase document #15673. The script download includes a readme file with current usage information.
